title: Oorellam Kekkude Lyrics Thodari Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Thodari Oorellam Kekkude Song Lyrics
Singer(s): Shreya Ghoshal & Maria Roe

Oorellam Kekkude
en paattuthaan.
kuyil ellaam pogudhey
thalai aattithaan.

thendral isai aagudhae
pookkal jadhi solludhe
aarellaam raagamaai
odudhey.
megangal thazhamthaan
podudhey.

Oorellam Kekkude
en paattuthaan.
kuyil ellaam pogudhey
thalai aattithaan.

kaalai ezhundhaal
paadal padhivu.
maalai muzhudhum
medai nigazhvu.

ennudaya paadal
kezhaamal orr uyirum
thoogap pogaadhu.

ennudaya perai
sollaamal vanozhiyil
paadal koodaadhu.

enisai kaettu
pazhagaamal irave
kidayaadhu.

en kural kaetka
marandhaale
uzhagae vidiyaadhu.

Oorellam Kekkude
en paattuthaan.
kuyil ellaam pogudhey
thalai aattithaan.

Gaana kuyilaai
paadi parakka.
maagya mangalil
adichi pulikka.

...

...

every body all around
listens to my song.
birds in the tree's
vishil it a long..

winds blow around
to my beat flowers are bound

rivers flow singingÂ 
my lullaby.
clouds gets to my rhythm
in the sky. (2)
